name: The Mad Lieutenant
description: Edward Larkin is at it again, this time claiming that tribbles--yes, tribbles--are the solution to the temporal anomaly crisis. Can you capture Larkin and get him the help he clearly needs?
rules:
-- Unique Ferengi Traditionalist, Hirogen, and Klingon Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using McCoy, Larkin, Lucero, Tribble Kirk, Tribbled or Exobiology Crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: McCoy, Larkin, Lucero, Tribble Kirk, Tribbled or Exobiology
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Uhura
featured_crew.flavor: Uhura buys a tribble from intergalactic trader.

featured_crew.name: Larkin
featured_crew.flavor: Larkin steps out of his quarters in his underwear to witness the consequences of his unauthorized experiments with tribbles.

rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

rewards.name: Hirogen Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Hirogen faction missions.

rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Janitor
rewards.flavor: An officer aboard the U.S.S Cabot was given the unfortunate task of cleaning up Larkinâ€™s modified Tribbles.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Uhura
rewards.flavor: Uhura buys a tribble from intergalactic trader.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Uhura
rewards.flavor: Uhura buys a tribble from intergalactic trader.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

goals.flavor: Destroy the tribble menace with the Klingons.

potential_rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Don't you see? The answer's been in front of us all along! It's tribbles! The mighty tribble is the creature that can save us all from this madness. The tribble can end the temporal anomaly crisis! No need to thank me--or, at least, wait until we're done."
"The man's beyond delusional. He's a downright psychotic menace. Certifiable, and I should know--I signed the certificate for his placement in a mental health facility."

"I wish I didn't still feel Edward was my responsibility... but he was once part of my crew, so I do. I'll do everything I can to help catch him before he does... whatever he's planning to do, but he's wily. We could use your help, Captain."

"Don't you see? The answer's been in front of us all along! It's tribbles! The mighty tribble is the creature that can save us all from this madness. The tribble can end the temporal anomaly crisis! No need to thank me--or, at least, wait until we're done."
"The man's beyond delusional. He's a downright psychotic menace. Certifiable, and I should know--I signed the certificate for his placement in a mental health facility."

"I wish I didn't still feel Edward was my responsibility... but he was once part of my crew, so I do. I'll do everything I can to help catch him before he does... whatever he's planning to do, but he's wily. We could use your help, Captain."

"Don't you see? The answer's been in front of us all along! It's tribbles! The mighty tribble is the creature that can save us all from this madness. The tribble can end the temporal anomaly crisis! No need to thank me--or, at least, wait until we're done."
"The man's beyond delusional. He's a downright psychotic menace. Certifiable, and I should know--I signed the certificate for his placement in a mental health facility."

"I wish I didn't still feel Edward was my responsibility... but he was once part of my crew, so I do. I'll do everything I can to help catch him before he does... whatever he's planning to do, but he's wily. We could use your help, Captain."

"Don't you see? The answer's been in front of us all along! It's tribbles! The mighty tribble is the creature that can save us all from this madness. The tribble can end the temporal anomaly crisis! No need to thank me--or, at least, wait until we're done."
"The man's beyond delusional. He's a downright psychotic menace. Certifiable, and I should know--I signed the certificate for his placement in a mental health facility."

"I wish I didn't still feel Edward was my responsibility... but he was once part of my crew, so I do. I'll do everything I can to help catch him before he does... whatever he's planning to do, but he's wily. We could use your help, Captain."
